job_details.Functieomschrijving:
You'll be working on a search engine that serves both journalists and customers of DPG Media, across all media offerings. The company and your team members will actively support you to grow your skills and expertise. The search team consists of three developers, two based in Amsterdam and another in Antwerp. This is who you will be working with on a daily basis. Furthermore, the search team is part of a

   larger Recommendation & Search area consisting of approximately 20 engineers, a single manager and two product owners, in the Netherlands and Belgium. We work with an agile philosophy and on a flexible working regime. While most colleagues work from home, we like to get together in the offices regularly. You will be supported by a platform engineering team that manages the CICD pipelines, Machine

   Learning workflows and most of the infrastructure. This team is tasked with enabling the success of and synergies between the application teams.

     * Maintain and extend our search back-end.
     * Design, develop, run and evaluate online AB-tests to improve the quality of the search results.
     * Support operational excellence through practices like code review and pair programming
     * The entire team is responsible for the operations of our services. This includes actively monitoring different applications and their infrastructure as well as intervening to solve operational problems whenever they arise.
     * Keep up with developments in the field of Information Retrieval (e.g. semantic search).
     * Build RAG solutions for editorial domain

   Technologies
     * AWS, Kafka, Elasticsearch, Python (FastAPI), SQL, Docker
     * Nice to have: vector databases, semantic search
job_details.full_text:
Software Engineer

You'll be working on a search engine that serves both journalists and customers of DPG Media, across all media offerings. The company and your team members will actively support you to grow your skills and expertise. The search team consists of three developers, two based in Amsterdam and another in Antwerp. This is who you will be working with on a daily basis. Furthermore, the search team is part of a

   larger Recommendation & Search area consisting of approximately 20 engineers, a single manager and two product owners, in the Netherlands and Belgium. We work with an agile philosophy and on a flexible working regime. While most colleagues work from home, we like to get together in the offices regularly. You will be supported by a platform engineering team that manages the CICD pipelines, Machine

   Learning workflows and most of the infrastructure. This team is tasked with enabling the success of and synergies between the application teams.

     * Maintain and extend our search back-end.
     * Design, develop, run and evaluate online AB-tests to improve the quality of the search results.
     * Support operational excellence through practices like code review and pair programming
     * The entire team is responsible for the operations of our services. This includes actively monitoring different applications and their infrastructure as well as intervening to solve operational problems whenever they arise.
     * Keep up with developments in the field of Information Retrieval (e.g. semantic search).
     * Build RAG solutions for editorial domain

   Technologies
     * AWS, Kafka, Elasticsearch, Python (FastAPI), SQL, Docker
     * Nice to have: vector databases, semantic search

profile_classification.rationale: The role emphasizes building RAG solutions and keeping up with semantic search developments, indicating a focus on generative AI applications. While it involves software engineering and operations, the core tasks lean towards leveraging and developing AI-driven search functionalities rather than traditional ML model building.

phrases: Software Engineer
Maintain and extend our search back-end
Design, develop, run and evaluate online AB-tests to improve the quality of the search results
Support operational excellence through practices like code review and pair programming
The entire team is responsible for the operations of our services
actively monitoring different applications and their infrastructure as well as intervening to solve operational problems whenever they arise
job_tasks.justification: The job description explicitly states 'Software Engineer' and details responsibilities like maintaining back-ends, developing tests, and operational support, which are core to software development.

phrases: Build RAG solutions for editorial domain
Keep up with developments in the field of Information Retrieval (e.g. semantic search)
job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'RAG solutions' and 'semantic search' directly relates to building and adapting models, particularly in the generative AI and information retrieval space.

phrases: Support operational excellence through practices like code review and pair programming
The entire team is responsible for the operations of our services
actively monitoring different applications and their infrastructure as well as intervening to solve operational problems whenever they arise
You will be supported by a platform engineering team that manages the CICD pipelines, Machine Learning workflows and most of the infrastructure.
job_tasks.justification: The role involves direct responsibility for operations, monitoring, and problem-solving for services, alongside mentions of CICD pipelines and ML workflows managed by a supporting team, indicating an operational focus.

phrases: search engine that serves both journalists and customers of DPG Media, across all media offerings
job_tasks.justification: While not explicitly detailed, the context of building a search engine implies underlying data handling and processing, which falls under data engineering.

phrases: The company and your team members will actively support you to grow your skills and expertise
Keep up with developments in the field of Information Retrieval (e.g. semantic search)
soft_skills.justification: The job description explicitly mentions support for skill growth and the need to stay updated with advancements in the field, highlighting a need for continuous learning and adaptability.

phrases: You'll be working on a search engine that serves both journalists and customers of DPG Media, across all media offerings.
The search team consists of three developers, two based in Amsterdam and another in Antwerp. This is who you will be working with on a daily basis.
Furthermore, the search team is part of a larger Recommendation & Search area consisting of approximately 20 engineers, a single manager and two product owners, in the Netherlands and Belgium.
We work with an agile philosophy and on a flexible working regime.
soft_skills.justification: The description details the team structure, cross-functional collaboration with product owners and other engineers, and the agile methodology, all of which require strong communication and collaboration skills.

phrases: Maintain and extend our search back-end
Design, develop, run and evaluate online AB-tests to improve the quality of the search results

The entire team is responsible for the operations of our services. This includes actively monitoring different applications and their infrastructure as well as intervening to solve operational problems whenever they arise.
soft_skills.justification: Responsibilities include maintaining and improving a search back-end, evaluating tests, and actively solving operational problems, all of which require problem-solving and a pragmatic approach.

phrases: Build RAG solutions for editorial domain
soft_skills.justification: The task of building RAG solutions suggests an element of innovation and taking ownership of developing new AI-driven features.
